customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like NBA Jam
customer_reviews.text: This is not like NBA Jam. Extra points are given for first shot, perfect shot, and a 2x dunk lottery which can also get an extra point for perfect shot. There is no shot meter and the mechanics heavily favor the AI giving them more points and making them near impossible to beat as you progress in the game. I regret this purchase. It's not "Jam" it's not "2K" it's just crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pisana

customer_reviews.title: Horrible game.
customer_reviews.text: This is a review for the Switch version which has yet to be patched and it doesn't matter because I knew as soon as they announced YouTuber Characters coming to the game that the money spent on this game was a waste. Developers are focusing on the wrong things, who adds random people from YouTube to a basketball game? Don't buy this. If you think this is like NBA Jam... It's not even close to as good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY EVEN IF IT'S FREE
customer_reviews.text: This game is a clunking piece of junk I play SNES NBA Jam over this. this game is a waste of money and Saber Interactive should be ashamed of this trash. The AI is terrible and controls are cumbersome at best do yourself a favor and do not buy this game. i HOPE SWITCH GETS A NBA JAM OR STREET this game doesn't cut it
customer_reviews.author: todd jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great game!  Folks apparently don't know how to use the shot meter.....
customer_reviews.text: The game is actually fun! The key is getting your timing down for your shot using the shot meter. Unlocking new playgrounds is done by beating tournaments. You unlock players as well that you can turn around and use. You can play online which adds to the fun and the game is challenging. If you don't want a complex game like NBA 2K, this is the game you can pick up and start playing from the jump. Definitely worth the price of admission. I got it on the PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Lotto

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy the game
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the game, the big problem is I've beaten the first two playgrounds with gold and did the specific task but it didn't unlock the third playground or court. It would be great if that could be fixed soon! and it would change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: This game is complete garbage. If you're looking for an NBA Jam like ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is complete garbage. If you're looking for an NBA Jam like game this is not the one to buy. Shot timing is garbage and the AI playing with you is terrible yet the AI opponent plays like a pair of idiot savants. Do not buy this game until problems have been addressed or nerfed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

ABOUT THE GAMEClassic NBA arcade action is back! 

Take your “A” game to the playground and beat the best in high-flying 2-on-2 basketball action. Practice your skills offline, play with up to three others on your PC or take your talents online to posterize your opponents with acrobatic jams and ridiculous displays of skill.
